RAG System Overview

A Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system combines the power of information retrieval with large language models to provide accurate and contextual responses.

Key Components

  • Document Store: PostgreSQL with pgvector extension
  • Embeddings: Google Vertex AI text-embedding-005 (768 dimensions)
  • Search: Vector similarity using cosine distance

Supported Formats

Category Formats Processing
Documents PDF, TXT, MD, HTML Markdown conversion
Structured Data JSON, XML, YAML YAML normalization
Code Python, JavaScript, CSS Plain text

Architecture Benefits

  1. Quality: LLM-optimized extraction preserves document structure
  2. Portability: PostgreSQL storage (multi-cloud compatible)
  3. Scalability: Efficient vector search with pgvector

Code Example

from document_processor import DocumentProcessor

processor = DocumentProcessor()
text = processor.extract_text(html_bytes, "html")
chunks = processor.chunk_text(text)
